in bengaluru many parents feel that beti bachao beti padhao bbbp has many loopholes and people are being harassed instead of helped whenever the topic comes up in public meetings
in ludhiana many officials feel that mid day meal scheme mdm seems useful for some groups but others are left out
in new delhi many officials feel that smart cities mission has created more confusion than benefit for common people as reflected in recent conversations on social media
in jaipur many citizens feel that mid day meal scheme mdm looks good on paper but implementation is very weak according to informal surveys done by community groups
from the perspective of parents in jaipur pm awas yojana pmay housing for all has genuinely improved access for ordinary people as reflected in recent conversations on social media
policy_title: PM Awas Yojana (PMAY)  Housing for All
